Components

About

Used in the homepage

Our Story

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident.

Read more
Markup: about/about.twig 
<!--ABOUT AREA-->
<section class="about-area section-padding">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-5 col-lg-5 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title">
          <h2>{{ title|raw }}</h2>
        </div>
        <div class="about-content">
          <p>{{ exerpt }}</p>
          <a href="{{ cta.url }}" class="read-more" {{  cta.is_external ? ' target="_blank"' : '' }}>{{ cta.text }}</a>
        </div>
      </div>
      {% if is_video %}
        <div class="col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-offset-1 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 hidden-xs">
          <div class="about-video">
            <img src="{{ image.src }}" alt="{{ image.alt }}">
            <a href="{{ video.src }}" class="about-video-button" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in"><i class="fa fa-play"></i></a>
          </div>
        </div>
      {% else %}
        <div class="col-md-7 col-lg-7 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
          <div class="row">
            <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">
              <div class="about-img">
                <img src="{{ image_left.src }}" alt="{{ image_left.alt }}">
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">
              <div class="about-img">
                <img src="{{ image_right.src }}" alt="{{ image_right.alt }}">
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--ABOUT AREA END-->

Markup: counter/counter.twig 
<!--COUNTER AREA-->
<div class="counter-area section-padding">
  <div class="count-area-bg" style="background-image: url('{{ background_image.src }}');"></div>
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      {% for item in items %}
      <div class="col-md-3 col-lg-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">
        <div class="single-counter text-center">
          <div class="counter-icon"><i class="{{ item.classes }}"></i></div>
          <h3 class="counter">{{ item.total|number_format(0, '.', ',')  }}</h3>
          <p>{{ item.text }}</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
<!--COUNTER AREA END-->

Markup: featured-blog/featured-blog.twig 
<!--BLOG AREA-->
<section class="blog-area section-padding">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ pre_title }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ title }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      {% for item in items %}
      <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="single-post text-center">
          <div class="blog-post-img ">
            <img src="{{ item.image.src }}" alt="{{ item.image.alt }}">
          </div>
          <div class="post-details">
            <a href="{{ item.category.url }}" class="post-meta-button">{{ item.category.name }}</a>
            <h3><a href="{{ item.url }}">{{ item.title }}</a></h3>
            <p class="post-meta"><a href="#">{{ item.published_date }}</a> - <a href="#">{{ item.total_comments }} Comments</a></p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--BLOG AREA END-->

Markup: featured-profile/featured-profile.twig 
<!--TEAM AREA-->
<section class="team-area section-padding">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ pre_title }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ title }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 team-slider">
        {% for item in items %}
        <div class="single-team-member text-center">
          <div class="team-member-img ">
            <img src="{{ item.image.src }}" alt="{{ item.image.alt }}">
            <div class="member-social-bookmark">

              {% if item.socials %}
              <ul>
                {% for social_item in item.socials %}
                <li><a href="{{ social_item.url }}" target="_blank"><i class="fa fa-{{ social_item.type }}"></i></a></li>
                {% endfor %}
              </ul>
              {% endif %}
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="member-details">
            <h3>{{ item.name }}</h3>
            <p>{{ item.description }}</p>
          </div>
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--TEAM AREA END-->

Markup: header-slider/header-slider.twig 
<!--HOME SLIDER AREA-->
<div class="slider-area">
  <div class="pogoSlider">
    {% for item in items %}
    <div class="pogoSlider-slide" data-transition="fade" {% if loop.index == 1 %} data-duration="1500"{% endif %} style="background:url({{ item.image }}) no-repeat scroll 0 0 / cover;">
      <h2 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="700">{{ item.pre_title }}</h2>
      <h1 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="1500">{{ item.title|raw }}</h1>
      {% if item.cta %}
      	<h3 class="pogoSlider-slide-element" data-in="expand" data-out="expand" data-duration="2300"><a href="{{ item.cta.url }}">{{ item.cta.text }}</a></h3>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
</div>
<!--HOME SLIDER AREA END-->

    Markup: promotions/promotions.twig 
    <!--PROMOTIONS AREA-->
<section class="promotions-area section-padding">
  <div class="promotion-area-bg" style="background-image: url('{{ background_image }}');"></div>
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ pre_title }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ title }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      {% for item in items %}
      <div class="col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="single-promotions text-center">
          <div class="promotions-img">
            <img src="{{ item.image.src }}" alt="{{ item.image.alt }}">
            <div class="pakage-rate">
              <p>From <span>{{ item.cost }}</span></p>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="promotions-details">
            <h4>{{ item.title }}</h4>
            <a href="#{{ item.promo_code }}" class="read-more">Order now</a>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--PROMOTIONS AREA END-->

  <div class="testmonial-area-bg" style="background-image: url('{{ background_image.src }}');"></div>
  <div class="container-fluid wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row testmonial-slider">
      {% for item in items %}
      <div class="col-md-offset-2 col-lg-offset-2 col-lg-8  col-md-8 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="single-testmonail text-center">
          <div class="quate-icon"><i class="fa fa-quote-right"></i></div>
          <p>{{ item.text }}</p>
          <div class="testmonial-member-name-title">
            <h4>{{ item.author }}</h4>
            <p>{{ item.position }}</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

    Markup: todays-menu/todays-menu.twig 
    <!--MENUS AREA-->
<section class="menus-area section-padding" id="menu">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ pre_title }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ title }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="food-menu-list-menu">
          <ul>
            <li class="filter active" data-filter="all">All</li>
            {% for category in categories %}
            <li class="filter" data-filter=".{{ category.slug }}">{{ category.name }}</li>
            {% endfor %}
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row food-menu-list">
      {% for item in items %}
      <div class="mix col-md-3 col-lg-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 single-menu {{ item.categories|join(' ') }}">
        <div class="food-menu-img">
          <a href="{{ item.image.src }}" class="menu-popup" data-effect="mfp-zoom-out"><img src="{{ item.thumbnail.src }}" alt="{{ item.thumbnail.alt }}"></a>
        </div>
        <div class="food-menu-details">
          <h4>{{ item.title }}</h4>
          <p class="menu-price">{{ item.price }}</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--MENUS AREA END-->

    Markup: upcoming-events/upcoming-events.twig 
    <section class="event-area section-padding">
  <div class="event-area-bg" style="background-image: url('{{ background_image }}')"></div>
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ pre_title }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ title }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row event-list">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        {% for item in items %}
        <div class="single-event">
          <div class="event-img">
            <img src="{{ item.image.src }}" alt="{{ item.image.alt }}">
          </div>
          <div class="event-content">
            <div class="event-date">
              <p><span>{{ item.date.day }}</span>{{ item.date.month }}</p>
            </div>
            <div class="event-details">
              <h3><a href="single-event.html">{{ item.title }}</a></h3>
              <p class="event-meta"><a href="#">{{ item.date.full }}</a>- {{ item.location }}</p>
              <p>{{ item.description }}</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
    Source: upcoming-events/upcoming-events.scss, line 1
